title: Real world exposure by partnering with price comparison sites
body:
When I buy something, one of the most important things ends up being price. With this, I often use price comparison sites when I know exactly what I'm looking for, and go with the cheapest trusted provider.

I think the team should look at partnership with price comparison websites in order to get more exposure to SPI - At the end of the day, with the SPI discount, products from shopping.io will most of the time be the cheapest, so being on top of these lists would get us a ton of exposure (could also really use this to emphasize the discount you get from holding the tokens).
choices: Yes, the team should see if this is possible as it would bring a lot more users to the platform.
Yes, but let's first release 2.0 and staking 2.0
No, I don't think this will drive meaningful traffic and hodlers to shopping.io
author: 0xCfE7AF776023f17D24C14c5965AceE72697d5906
